HybridBooleanSelectButton - Class in com.michaelRunzler.ARK.android.util.ButtonVariants
 
HybridBooleanSelectButton(RelativeLayout, String, Drawable, String, boolean) - Constructor for class com.michaelRunzler.ARK.android.util.ButtonVariants.HybridBooleanSelectButton
The simplest variant of the HybridSettingsButton, this allows a user to turn a setting on or off, using a boolean value to track state internally.
HybridFileSelectButton - Class in com.michaelRunzler.ARK.android.util.ButtonVariants
 
HybridFileSelectButton(RelativeLayout, String, Drawable, String, String, File, File) - Constructor for class com.michaelRunzler.ARK.android.util.ButtonVariants.HybridFileSelectButton
A variant of the HybridSettingsButton, this allows a user to select a file from the Android filesystem, and displays whether or not said value has been set yet.
HybridMultiSelectButton - Class in com.michaelRunzler.ARK.android.util.ButtonVariants
 
HybridMultiSelectButton(RelativeLayout, String, Drawable, String, Integer, String...) - Constructor for class com.michaelRunzler.ARK.android.util.ButtonVariants.HybridMultiSelectButton
A variant of the HybridSettingsButton, this allows a user to select a file from the Android filesystem, and displays whether or not said value has been set yet.
HybridSettingsButton - Class in com.michaelRunzler.ARK.android.util.ButtonVariants
Determines settings, behavior, and handling for a linked hybrid settings button (instances of the XML layout hybrid_settings_button).
HybridTargetActivatorButton - Class in com.michaelRunzler.ARK.android.util.ButtonVariants
 
HybridTargetActivatorButton(RelativeLayout, String, Drawable, String, boolean, TargetActivatorButtonEventHandler) - Constructor for class com.michaelRunzler.ARK.android.util.ButtonVariants.HybridTargetActivatorButton
Functions aa sub-variant of the basic HybridBooleanSelectButton, but when the user clicks the button, the state is not automatically toggled, and an externally-defined action may be taken as specified by a TargetActivatorButtonEventHandler object, essentially making the button's function customizable.
